name: Swimming Raoul
description:
A short underwater adventure game.

It was an entry for an "underwater challenge" from SoloCode Godot Engine discord.

Throw bubbles on animals to interact with them.

Use the radar to find them.

Controls  : 

Arrow keys or wasd : swim

Space bar or controller A button : throw bubbles

CTRL key or  controller A button : accelerate

Please not that english is not my native langague so tell me if you find errors in the dialogs.
